channel.title: Need help with 614 source
channel.description:
i need help with a 614 source everytime i run this happens this is legacy 614 can anyone help and if this is in wrong place please dont flame me or spamm me im new to this....
[Server] Connecting to vote4tokens database Class not found exception No suitable driver found for jdbc:mysql://www.legacy614.org:3306/legacy_vote Unable to connect to MySQL Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Need help with 614 source
item.dc:creator: @puretarget puretarget
item.description:
@puretarget wrote:

[quote=“Bumm85, post:2, topic:393743”]Dude no offence but you gotta learn to read the error…

Obviously it’s got nothing to do with the actuall server because Mysql has to do with web pages such as vbulletin. Just take out the vote4tokens database.[/quote]

and how do i do that… i tryed and got 100 erors
